location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the back cover with 3; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The document is a report on the visit by representatives of the Bahrain General Merchants Association to the Political Agency at Bahrain. The newly formed association voiced its discontent for the electricity costs imposed by the Bahrain Electric Department and requested clarity on the import of Italian goods to India when the two countries were at war.
